src:
札幌で初雪観測、平年より１０日遅く

07 Nov 2019, 10:45



紅葉シーズンも終盤、札幌市内では初雪が観測された（７日午後）＝鷹見安浩撮影

　上空に強い寒気が入り込んだ影響で、７日の北海道内は各地で冷え込み、札幌市では午後１時頃に初雪を観測した。札幌管区気象台によると、平年より１０日遅く、昨年より１３日早いという。
　７日の最低気温は、陸別町で氷点下７・９度と、道内の今季最低に。標茶町では同７・６度を観測した。
　８日も北海道の上空には寒気が残り、夜は気圧の谷が通過することから日本海側で雨や雪になるという。
text:
First snow observation in Sapporo, 10 days later than normal

07 Nov 2019, 10:45



At the end of the autumnal season, the first snow was observed in Sapporo (afternoon on the 7th) = taken by Yasuhiro Takami

Due to the influence of strong cold air in the sky, Hokkaido was chilling in various places in Hokkaido on the 7th, and first snow was observed around 1 pm in Sapporo. According to the Sapporo Region Meteorological Observatory, it is 10 days later than normal and 13 days earlier than last year.
-7 The lowest temperature on the 7th is Rikubetsu town, where the freezing point is 7.9 degrees Celsius, which is the lowest in this season. In Shibecha-cho, I observed 7.6 degrees.
On the 8th, cold air remains over Hokkaido, and at night, a valley of atmospheric pressure passes.
